#  为什么需要对数值类型的特征做归一化？ 

首先特征归一化的目的是为了消除数据特征之间的量纲影响。这样不同指标的数据才具有可比性。

例如：分析一个人的身高和体重对于健康的影响，如果分别使用了m和kg作为长度和重量的单位，那么身高所处的范围会是1.6m-1.8m，体重所处范围是50kg-100kg。如果这样的数据作为输入，分析的结果会具有明显的倾向。因此这个时候为了得到更加准确的结果 ，就需要进行特征归一化处理，使得各项指标处在同一个数量级，以便进行分析。

常用的两种方法：

1. 线性函数归一化

它对原始的数据进行线性变换，使其结果映射到[0,1]的范围内。相当于等比缩放。

公式为:

![img](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%2223.461ex%22%20height%3D%225.676ex%22%20style%3D%22vertical-align%3A%20-2.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-1437.2%2010101.4%202443.8%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3EX_%7Bnorm%7D%3D%5Cfrac%7BX-X_%7Bmin%7D%7D%7BX_%7Bmax%7D-X_%7Bmin%7D%7D%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-58%22%20d%3D%22M42%200H40Q26%200%2026%2011Q26%2015%2029%2027Q33%2041%2036%2043T55%2046Q141%2049%20190%2098Q200%20108%20306%20224T411%20342Q302%20620%20297%20625Q288%20636%20234%20637H206Q200%20643%20200%20645T202%20664Q206%20677%20212%20683H226Q260%20681%20347%20681Q380%20681%20408%20681T453%20682T473%20682Q490%20682%20490%20671Q490%20670%20488%20658Q484%20643%20481%20640T465%20637Q434%20634%20411%20620L488%20426L541%20485Q646%20598%20646%20610Q646%20628%20622%20635Q617%20635%20609%20637Q594%20637%20594%20648Q594%20650%20596%20664Q600%20677%20606%20683H618Q619%20683%20643%20683T697%20681T738%20680Q828%20680%20837%20683H845Q852%20676%20852%20672Q850%20647%20840%20637H824Q790%20636%20763%20628T722%20611T698%20593L687%20584Q687%20585%20592%20480L505%20384Q505%20383%20536%20304T601%20142T638%2056Q648%2047%20699%2046Q734%2046%20734%2037Q734%2035%20732%2023Q728%207%20725%204T711%201Q708%201%20678%201T589%202Q528%202%20496%202T461%201Q444%201%20444%2010Q444%2011%20446%2025Q448%2035%20450%2039T455%2044T464%2046T480%2047T506%2054Q523%2062%20523%2064Q522%2064%20476%20181L429%20299Q241%2095%20236%2084Q232%2076%20232%2072Q232%2053%20261%2047Q262%2047%20267%2047T273%2046Q276%2046%20277%2046T280%2045T283%2042T284%2035Q284%2026%20282%2019Q279%206%20276%204T261%201Q258%201%20243%201T201%202T142%202Q64%202%2042%200Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20d%3D%22M21%20287Q22%20293%2024%20303T36%20341T56%20388T89%20425T135%20442Q171%20442%20195%20424T225%20390T231%20369Q231%20367%20232%20367L243%20378Q304%20442%20382%20442Q436%20442%20469%20415T503%20336T465%20179T427%2052Q427%2026%20444%2026Q450%2026%20453%2027Q482%2032%20505%2065T540%20145Q542%20153%20560%20153Q580%20153%20580%20145Q580%20144%20576%20130Q568%20101%20554%2073T508%2017T439%20-10Q392%20-10%20371%2017T350%2073Q350%2092%20386%20193T423%20345Q423%20404%20379%20404H374Q288%20404%20229%20303L222%20291L189%20157Q156%2026%20151%2016Q138%20-11%20108%20-11Q95%20-11%2087%20-5T76%207T74%2017Q74%2030%20112%20180T152%20343Q153%20348%20153%20366Q153%20405%20129%20405Q91%20405%2066%20305Q60%20285%2060%20284Q58%20278%2041%20278H27Q21%20284%2021%20287Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-6F%22%20d%3D%22M201%20-11Q126%20-11%2080%2038T34%20156Q34%20221%2064%20279T146%20380Q222%20441%20301%20441Q333%20441%20341%20440Q354%20437%20367%20433T402%20417T438%20387T464%20338T476%20268Q476%20161%20390%2075T201%20-11ZM121%20120Q121%2070%20147%2048T206%2026Q250%2026%20289%2058T351%20142Q360%20163%20374%20216T388%20308Q388%20352%20370%20375Q346%20405%20306%20405Q243%20405%20195%20347Q158%20303%20140%20230T121%20120Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-72%22%20d%3D%22M21%20287Q22%20290%2023%20295T28%20317T38%20348T53%20381T73%20411T99%20433T132%20442Q161%20442%20183%20430T214%20408T225%20388Q227%20382%20228%20382T236%20389Q284%20441%20347%20441H350Q398%20441%20422%20400Q430%20381%20430%20363Q430%20333%20417%20315T391%20292T366%20288Q346%20288%20334%20299T322%20328Q322%20376%20378%20392Q356%20405%20342%20405Q286%20405%20239%20331Q229%20315%20224%20298T190%20165Q156%2025%20151%2016Q138%20-11%20108%20-11Q95%20-11%2087%20-5T76%207T74%2017Q74%2030%20114%20189T154%20366Q154%20405%20128%20405Q107%20405%2092%20377T68%20316T57%20280Q55%20278%2041%20278H27Q21%20284%2021%20287Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-6D%22%20d%3D%22M21%20287Q22%20293%2024%20303T36%20341T56%20388T88%20425T132%20442T175%20435T205%20417T221%20395T229%20376L231%20369Q231%20367%20232%20367L243%20378Q303%20442%20384%20442Q401%20442%20415%20440T441%20433T460%20423T475%20411T485%20398T493%20385T497%20373T500%20364T502%20357L510%20367Q573%20442%20659%20442Q713%20442%20746%20415T780%20336Q780%20285%20742%20178T704%2050Q705%2036%20709%2031T724%2026Q752%2026%20776%2056T815%20138Q818%20149%20821%20151T837%20153Q857%20153%20857%20145Q857%20144%20853%20130Q845%20101%20831%2073T785%2017T716%20-10Q669%20-10%20648%2017T627%2073Q627%2092%20663%20193T700%20345Q700%20404%20656%20404H651Q565%20404%20506%20303L499%20291L466%20157Q433%2026%20428%2016Q415%20-11%20385%20-11Q372%20-11%20364%20-4T353%208T350%2018Q350%2029%20384%20161L420%20307Q423%20322%20423%20345Q423%20404%20379%20404H374Q288%20404%20229%20303L222%20291L189%20157Q156%2026%20151%2016Q138%20-11%20108%20-11Q95%20-11%2087%20-5T76%207T74%2017Q74%2030%20112%20181Q151%20335%20151%20342Q154%20357%20154%20369Q154%20405%20129%20405Q107%20405%2092%20377T69%20316T57%20280Q55%20278%2041%20278H27Q21%20284%2021%20287Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-3D%22%20d%3D%22M56%20347Q56%20360%2070%20367H707Q722%20359%20722%20347Q722%20336%20708%20328L390%20327H72Q56%20332%2056%20347ZM56%20153Q56%20168%2072%20173H708Q722%20163%20722%20153Q722%20140%20707%20133H70Q56%20140%2056%20153Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-2212%22%20d%3D%22M84%20237T84%20250T98%20270H679Q694%20262%20694%20250T679%20230H98Q84%20237%2084%20250Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-69%22%20d%3D%22M184%20600Q184%20624%20203%20642T247%20661Q265%20661%20277%20649T290%20619Q290%20596%20270%20577T226%20557Q211%20557%20198%20567T184%20600ZM21%20287Q21%20295%2030%20318T54%20369T98%20420T158%20442Q197%20442%20223%20419T250%20357Q250%20340%20236%20301T196%20196T154%2083Q149%2061%20149%2051Q149%2026%20166%2026Q175%2026%20185%2029T208%2043T235%2078T260%20137Q263%20149%20265%20151T282%20153Q302%20153%20302%20143Q302%20135%20293%20112T268%2061T223%2011T161%20-11Q129%20-11%20102%2010T74%2074Q74%2091%2079%20106T122%20220Q160%20321%20166%20341T173%20380Q173%20404%20156%20404H154Q124%20404%2099%20371T61%20287Q60%20286%2059%20284T58%20281T56%20279T53%20278T49%20278T41%20278H27Q21%20284%2021%20287Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-61%22%20d%3D%22M33%20157Q33%20258%20109%20349T280%20441Q331%20441%20370%20392Q386%20422%20416%20422Q429%20422%20439%20414T449%20394Q449%20381%20412%20234T374%2068Q374%2043%20381%2035T402%2026Q411%2027%20422%2035Q443%2055%20463%20131Q469%20151%20473%20152Q475%20153%20483%20153H487Q506%20153%20506%20144Q506%20138%20501%20117T481%2063T449%2013Q436%200%20417%20-8Q409%20-10%20393%20-10Q359%20-10%20336%205T306%2036L300%2051Q299%2052%20296%2050Q294%2048%20292%2046Q233%20-10%20172%20-10Q117%20-10%2075%2030T33%20157ZM351%20328Q351%20334%20346%20350T323%20385T277%20405Q242%20405%20210%20374T160%20293Q131%20214%20119%20129Q119%20126%20119%20118T118%20106Q118%2061%20136%2044T179%2026Q217%2026%20254%2059T298%20110Q300%20114%20325%20217T351%20328Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-78%22%20d%3D%22M52%20289Q59%20331%20106%20386T222%20442Q257%20442%20286%20424T329%20379Q371%20442%20430%20442Q467%20442%20494%20420T522%20361Q522%20332%20508%20314T481%20292T458%20288Q439%20288%20427%20299T415%20328Q415%20374%20465%20391Q454%20404%20425%20404Q412%20404%20406%20402Q368%20386%20350%20336Q290%20115%20290%2078Q290%2050%20306%2038T341%2026Q378%2026%20414%2059T463%20140Q466%20150%20469%20151T485%20153H489Q504%20153%20504%20145Q504%20144%20502%20134Q486%2077%20440%2033T333%20-11Q263%20-11%20227%2052Q186%20-10%20133%20-10H127Q78%20-10%2057%2016T35%2071Q35%20103%2054%20123T99%20143Q142%20143%20142%20101Q142%2081%20130%2066T107%2046T94%2041L91%2040Q91%2039%2097%2036T113%2029T132%2026Q168%2026%20194%2071Q203%2087%20217%20139T245%20247T261%20313Q266%20340%20266%20352Q266%20380%20251%20392T217%20404Q177%20404%20142%20372T93%20290Q91%20281%2088%20280T72%20278H58Q52%20284%2052%20289Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-58%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(828%2C-150)%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20transform%3D%22scale(0.707)%22%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20transform%3D%22scale(0.707)%22%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6F%22%20x%3D%22600%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20transform%3D%22scale(0.707)%22%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-72%22%20x%3D%221086%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20transform%3D%22scale(0.707)%22%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6D%22%20x%3D%221537%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-3D%22%20x%3D%222914%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(3693%2C0)%22%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(397%2C0)%22%3E%0A%3Crect%20stroke%3D%22none%22%20width%3D%225890%22%20height%3D%2260%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%22220%22%3E%3C%2Frect%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(798%2C677)%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-58%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-2212%22%20x%3D%221074%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(2075%2C0)%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-58%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(828%2C-150)%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20transform%3D%22scale(0.707)%22%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6D%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20transform%3D%22scale(0.707)%22%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-69%22%20x%3D%22878%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20transform%3D%22scale(0.707)%22%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20x%3D%221224%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(60%2C-704)%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-58%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(828%2C-150)%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20transform%3D%22scale(0.707)%22%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6D%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20transform%3D%22scale(0.707)%22%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-61%22%20x%3D%22878%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20transform%3D%22scale(0.707)%22%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-78%22%20x%3D%221408%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-2212%22%20x%3D%222551%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(3551%2C0)%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-58%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(828%2C-150)%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20transform%3D%22scale(0.707)%22%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6D%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20transform%3D%22scale(0.707)%22%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-69%22%20x%3D%22878%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20transform%3D%22scale(0.707)%22%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20x%3D%221224%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)

2. 零均值归一化 

将数据映射到均值为0，标准差为1的分布上。

## 总结：

数据归一化并不是万能的，在实际的应用中，通过梯度下降法求解的模型通常是需要归一化的，包括线性回归，逻辑回归，支持向量机，神经网络等模型。但是对于决策树模型则不舍得，因为决策树在进行节点分裂时主要依靠数据集关于特征X的信息增益比，而信息增益比跟特征是否经过归一化是无关的，因为归一化并不会改变样本特征x上的信息增益。

## 参考

《白面机器学习》
